ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT(OR($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits", $RecordType.Name = "Scale", $Profile.Name = "CSB", $Profile.Name = "API User", $Profile.Name = "BRP Partner", $Profile.Name = "Scale-Underwriter", $User.LastName = "Delivery",$Profile.Name = 'API User',$Profile.Name = 'Accounting', $Profile.Name = "System Administrator")) &&
AND(
NOT( Auto_Renewal__c = TRUE), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c , "New Business - BOR")),
OR(
ISBLANK( Qualifying_Notes__c ) ),
OR(
ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Application Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Need Info From Client"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Need to Submit"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Received") ) )
